episode: I was out walking few days back when I saw a group fighting and had to run from there.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was out walking few days back when I saw a group fighting and had to run from there.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really intense! Are you okay?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yeah, all okay but was terrified seeing people fight.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's good to hear, but I can imagine how scary that must have been!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes. I was not sure what was going on.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, that sounds confusing and scary. Glad you're safe!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: have you been to similar situation?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Not exactly, but I can imagine the fear.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: what would have you done in this situation?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'd probably try to stay safe and avoid the situation too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: should we call police if there are people fighting on street?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, calling the police would be a good idea.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: what if people retaliate?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a risk, but safety comes first. Stay distant.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: ok. So idea is keep distance and call police when I feel safe. Should I give my identity to police or I can be anonymous?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You can be anonymous if you prefer.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: nice. That will help

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad to hear! Stay safe!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks, have a good day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You too!
